commit.message:
re PR target/64115 (ICE: : in rs6000_delegitimize_address, at config/rs6000/rs6000.c:7051)

	PR target/64115
	* config/rs6000/rs6000.c (rs6000_delegitimize_address): Remove
	invalid UNSPEC_TOCREL sanity check under ENABLE_CHECKING.

From-SVN: r218273

files.patch:

+	PR target/64115
+	* config/rs6000/rs6000.c (rs6000_delegitimize_address): Remove
+	invalid UNSPEC_TOCREL sanity check under ENABLE_CHECKING.
